title: The Ranger
description: He looks good in uniformHe looks even better out of it!Will Forrester--former Army Ranger, Southern gentleman, quintessential badass. Now an elite member of Ranger Security, Will once again has his work cut out for him. Especially when he meets Rhiannon Palmer.She's the most bullheaded, mouthy, flat-out sexy woman he's ever encountered. And he can't keep his hands off her.But Rhiannon's on a desperate search to find a good friend, and Will is the key. Despite the incredible chemistry between them, she makes it clear he's only the means to an end for her.Still, Will learned a thing or two about strategy in the army. Before long, he'll have her right where he wants her. In his bed...for good!
author: Rhonda Nelson
